future_requirements: Pay $2500 annual APN fee; Earn 10 AWS certifications (min 2 Professional); Complete 8 APN accreditations (4 Technical 4 Business); Generate $10k+ monthly AWS spend through 20+ ACE opportunities; Document 5 public migration case studies (≥10 apps each); Pass Migration Foundational Technical Review (mFTR); Complete Seller registration with tax/KYC; Implement SaaS Entitlement and Metering APIs; Pass Foundational Technical Review (FTR); Accept 1.5% marketplace fee

Join Partner Advantage Build path with verified domain; Earn 4 Professional Cloud Architect (PCA) certificates; Maintain ≥5 full-time employees; Document 3 end-to-end GCP migration case studies; Pass 3rd-party specialization audit; Complete tax/KYC and payment profile; Pass EP-1 checklist and security review; Accept variable 1.5%-3% revenue share; Complete Partner Certification Kickstart within 10 weeks

Enroll in Partner Center and accept Microsoft Partner Agreement (MPA); Earn 4 × AZ-104 + 2 × AZ-305 certificates; Achieve ≥70 Partner Capability Score (PCS) points; Generate $30k Windows VM ACR or $15k Linux VM ACR + $9k SQL MI/DB ACR per customer (3 customers); Tag all subscriptions with PAL or DPOR for revenue attribution; Pass 3rd-party Migration specialization audit; Implement SaaS Fulfillment API v2 with webhooks; Complete payout and tax profile setup; Accept 3% marketplace fee (1.5% renewal discount)

Pay $6000 total ($500 Partner Plus + $3000 Service Track + $3000 Build Track); Create IBM ID and join Partner Plus; Earn 2 × IBM Cloud Professional Architect (C9005800) badges; Document 2 production migrations (≥20 VMs or $10k monthly each); Pass Service-track Technical Validation call; Sign IBM Digital Platform Reseller Agreement; Implement Open Service Broker + hourly metering; Complete security review and catalog metadata; Accept 3% marketplace fee (1% renewals)

Pay $6500 total ($500 OPN + $3000 Service Track + $3000 Build Track); Create OPN membership and accept agreement; Earn OCI 2025 Architect Associate/Professional + OCI 2025 Migration Architect Professional + Oracle Cloud Support Specialist + PMP/CSM/Prince2; Document 2 validated go-lives or 1 published success story; Pass OCI Migration Service Expertise audit; Complete Marketplace Publisher Account registration; Implement supplier setup for payment processing; Accept 3% marketplace fee (97% retention)

Create PowerUP partner account and sign Partner Agreement; Earn 2 × Accredited Sales Professional + 1 × Accredited Sales Engineer via Cloudflare University; Complete 'Migrating to Cloudflare' workshop for Service Architect status; Generate ≥$10k/month Cloudflare billings; Document one Firebase Functions → Workers migration case study; Package PDD as Cloudflare App or Deploy to Workers template; Pass automated security scan and manual Worker review; Accept 70/30 revenue share

Sign Partner Pod agreement and submit tax info; Generate $200 net-new MRR within 90 days; Create migration-services landing page with named Solutions Architect; Generate $100k new ARR (trailing 12 months) for Engaged tier; Document two migration case studies showing ≥30% cost savings; Request Marketplace Vendor-Portal access; Submit clean Droplet snapshot or Helm-3 chart; Pass automated security scan and functional testing

Apply to Solution-Partner program and accept Partner/Integrations Marketplace Agreement; Complete Technical Excellence enablement (2 engineers pass quiz ≥80% + attend monthly calls); Execute ≥2 incremental migrations live (≥50k sessions/month each); Publish 1 public case study with Core Web Vitals improvements; Build native OAuth integration with minimal scopes (read:project read:deployment); Complete Integration console (logo screenshots documentation); Pass Approval Checklist review
